alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 01 at 10:24PM AKDT until November 03 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 10 AM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Klondike Highway, N of 4 mile. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 10 AM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy, wet snow could be difficult to manage. Visibilities could be reduced during periods of heavier snow. Greatest snowfall rates Wednesday evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
